title: Low budget... very disappointing total waste of time
review: Shocking how bad this movie actually is. The build up to it made it out to be really good yet it's more like a low budget Poundland movie. The original movie was by far better and scarier. The actors are rubbish and the clown is pathetic. If it was possible to leave no stars i would. Very disappointing waste of time doing a remake to have made it this bad:(
